item.title: Re: Hanging Out Question.
item.content:encoded:
I was typing up a response as well, but Uzuki beat me to the punch. However, a few added notes:

Using Make-Out Mood Enhancer with Bruce Jr. as the only member of your team would work as well, but those are quite difficult to come by.
You can also get Friend Points at the Party House in the Party Room. All-Out Bashes, yielding 10k Friend Points for 20k Ryo the first two times each day, gives the most friend points for each ryo spent.

item.title: Re: Hanging Out Question.
item.content:encoded:
If you hang out with an ally, your friend points get reset to zero. Nothing else that I can recall reduces friendship points, so you can do it across as many days as you need. Each day that you don't hang out with an ally, your friendship points stay. Whenever you get relatively near the top of the friend rankings, you'll hang out with that ally automatically (you don't get to choose when it happens). Silver Elixir does nothing to friend points, Silver Potion does, but it's not worth using.

Best way to get friend points is to party with J-Diddy, TicTac, and whoever you want to hang with (your case, Bruce Jr., not Sr.). Then run missions while using the Ninja-Mas Spirit (taught by the HoClaus). If you're in season 2, use Battle of Champions theme. If you've gotten lucky, you'll have Love Love Paradise. Then just run missions. Any missions will do, but preferably ones that you can pass regularly. After a couple days, you should be hanging with Bruce Jr.
